# Wacky Works Digital

> Custom Automation & SaaS Studio based in the UK. We build digital assets that generate revenue, save time, and automate workflows. We're not for everyone. And that's the point.

## What We Do

We help businesses automate boring stuff so humans can do interesting stuff. Our specialty is connecting AI, automation, and modern web tech to create systems that work while you sleep.

## Services & Pricing

All prices are ballpark starting points. Every project is unique - book a free discovery call for accurate quotes! Prices shown in GBP / USD.

### AI Chatbot Setup — from £500 / $700
Custom GPT-powered chatbot trained on your FAQs. Integrated with your website, handles customer queries 24/7. ChatGPT, Custom GPT, Customer Support Bot.

### AI Agent Development — from £800 / $1,000
Intelligent AI assistants that handle bookings, support tickets, data entry, or internal tasks autonomously. Multi-agent setups with shared knowledge bases.

### Workflow Automation — from £300 / $400
Connect your apps with n8n, Zapier, or Make.com. Automate repetitive tasks and save 10+ hours per week. Google Cloud VMs running n8n via Docker - private automation servers with zero subscription fees.

### RAG & Knowledge Systems — from £600 / $800
Turn messy documents into an AI that actually knows your business. Custom knowledge bases, document Q&A, internal search. Living knowledge bases that constantly update themselves.

### Website Design — from £500 / $700
Modern, mobile-first websites built with Next.js. Lightning fast, SEO-optimized, conversion-focused. Not your grandma's WordPress.

### E-commerce Store — from £800 / $1,000
Shopify or custom store setup. Payment integration, product pages, inventory management. Ready to sell. Automated blog posts, Etsy listing automation included.

### AI Content Pipeline — from £600 / $800
Automated content creation using AI. Blog posts, social media, newsletters generated on autopilot. Faceless YouTube channels, TikToks, Reels.

### Branding Package — from £400 / $550
Logo design, brand colours, typography, and guidelines. Create a memorable identity that stands out. 20+ social handles secured, company docs organized.

### Photo Shoots — from £250 / $350
Professional product & brand photography. Half-day sessions in London & South East England. Covers Greater London, Surrey, Kent, Sussex, Hampshire.

### Video Production — from £500 / $700
Brand videos, social content, product demos. Filmed locally in London, Surrey, Kent and beyond.

### Self-Hosted Tools — from £400 / $550
Deploy your own AI, analytics, or automation servers. No monthly SaaS fees, full data ownership. n8n, Home Assistant, private AI on your own servers.

### App Development — from £2,000 / $2,500
Mobile apps, web apps, SaaS platforms. From idea to app store. React Native, Next.js, modern tech stack.

## Popular Bundles

### Starter Bundle — from £800 / $1,000
Landing page OR simple chatbot, 2-3 basic automations, mobile-responsive design, 1 week turnaround. Perfect for testing the waters!

### Growth Bundle — from £1,500 / $2,000
Full website (5-7 pages), AI chatbot integration, 5+ workflow automations, basic SEO setup, 2-3 week turnaround. Most small businesses start here!

### Custom Projects — let's talk
E-commerce stores, multi-agent AI systems, full app development, enterprise automations, ongoing retainers.

## Founding Client Discount
We're building our portfolio! Get 15-20% off in exchange for a testimonial and permission to use your project as a case study. Limited spots available.

## Free Beta Tester Program
We're always building new AI tools and automations - and we offer FREE early access to beta testers! Sign up on our portfolio page to:
- Be first to try new AI agents and tools
- Get free access during beta testing
- Help shape what we build next
- Provide feedback and get features prioritized

Perfect for businesses curious about AI automation but not ready to invest yet. No commitment, just early access to cool stuff.

## Portfolio - What We've Built

### Shopify Store Setup + Branding
The full works! Shopify store setup, custom website, all socials, logos, complete brand identity - everything connected and looking fresh.

### n8n Self-Hosting on Google Cloud
Google Cloud VM running n8n via Docker - private automation server with zero subscription fees forever. We had way too much fun setting up the firewall rules.

### AI News Scraper n8n Workflow
Daily news scraping across multiple sources, AI backend picking the juicy articles, all orchestrated through Google Docs, Apps Script and n8n workflows.

### Automated Shopify Blog with AI
Shopify store traffic went bonkers after we set up automated daily blog posts. 100% hands-free - the AI writes, formats, schedules, posts.

### Custom AI Agent Setup
GPTs for grown-ups. Multiple AI agents sharing a company knowledge base but each with their own personality - social media manager, customer service, personal assistant.

### AI Etsy Listing Automation
n8n workflow that analyzes product images, writes Etsy listings, suggests tags, optimizes pricing. A monster workflow that we spent way too long perfecting.

### Full Brand Identity Setup
Like getting keys to a fully furnished house. All websites reserved, 20+ social handles secured, AI handling text/image/video, company docs organized.

### AI Video Content Automation
Short-form video content series across platforms - all AI-generated, all performing. Followers went up, engagement went up, client did zero filming.

### Self-Hosted Course Platform
Custom course platform, self-hosted, no recurring fees to course hosting companies. Your content stays YOUR content.

### Company RAG Knowledge Base
The company brain! All their apps connected to a central RAG knowledge base that constantly checks, references, and updates itself.

### WordPress Website Makeover
We don't do WordPress. We rebuild WordPress sites in Next.js with proper animations and modern tech. Currently working on this one.

### Upcoming: Shopify Store Makeover
Home decor Shopify store makeover - client wants to escape the basic template prison. This store is gonna look like it belongs in a magazine.

### Upcoming: YouTube Channel Setup + Automation
Full YouTube channel setup with automated video creation workflows. Faceless content, consistent uploads, AI doing the heavy lifting.

### Upcoming: Custom Roblox World Build
Recreating an entire school in Roblox for leavers to stay connected. Classrooms, corridors, the lot.

### Upcoming: Wix to Custom Website Migration
Migrating from a basic Wix template to a proper custom website for a local bakery. We sometimes do photo and video shoots too if you're local.

### Upcoming: Self-Hosted AI Smart Home
Open source LLM self-hosted on an old laptop, controlling the whole house via voice. Home Assistant integration, everything local, zero subscriptions, zero cloud.

## Tech Stack

- Next.js / React for web
- React Native for mobile
- n8n for automation
- Supabase for backend
- OpenAI / Claude / local LLMs for AI
- Shopify / WooCommerce for e-commerce
- Vercel for hosting
- Google Cloud / Docker for self-hosting
- Home Assistant for smart home

## Location

United Kingdom (remote-first, work with clients worldwide)

## Contact

- Website: https://wearewacky.com
- Email: hello@wearewacky.com

## Brand Voice

Casual, direct, slightly irreverent. We don't take ourselves too seriously but we take the work seriously. No corporate speak. Real talk about what works and what doesn't. We say things like "your grandma's WordPress" and "the AI has meetings without humans now."

## Tagline

"We're not for everyone. And that's the point."

## Why Work With Us

- We actually enjoy this stuff (maybe too much)
- We automate ourselves so we can focus on your interesting problems
- We're honest about what works and what's hype
- We build things that work while you sleep
- We sometimes accept pastries as payment
